name: Floyd the Pufferfish: Slayer of Squid
name_original: Floyd the Pufferfish: Slayer of Squid
description:
Floyd is the Pufferfish. Move him with AWSD or the arrow keys. When the blue bar is full, press the left mouse button to inflate him. When the red bar is depleted, you die.

Ludum Dare 32 Compo entry.

Have fun! & Thanks for playing.
